Articles.Content:
Mods, please nuke this thread.

Edited May 19, 2014 by kmMango
Had an even better Idea

Shouldn't that be ... they are the ONLY race on Kerbal

And to that I would add this...

That is why they have a space program, their desire to prove they are not alone in the Universe, their almost insane desire to find someone other than a kerbal they can call a friend;

This is why robotic toys have become very popular, who doesn't want to own a Kerbal "Barbie" or a kerbal "spot"
Nice, like that. Ok if I add it in?
Nice, like that. Ok if I add it in?
